# Notary Aimee - Aimee M. Skillin
## Colorado Notary Public, Loan Signing Agent, Certified Apostille Agent

> Aimee Skillin is a bilingual (English/Spanish) Colorado State Commissioned Notary Public based in Lone Tree, CO. She is a native speaker of both English and Spanish. Since launching her notary business in 2023, she has completed over 1,000 mobile notarizations and more than 250 remote online notarization (RON) sessions.

## Services
- Mobile Notary Public (in-person, travel to client)
- Remote Online Notarization (RON) via secure video call (worldwide, valid U.S. government-issued ID required)
- Apostille Services (Certified Apostille Agent, handles full process with Colorado Secretary of State)
- Loan Signing Agent (NNA & LSS trained, real estate closings, mortgage transactions, refinances)
- General Notary Services (acknowledgments, jurats, oaths, affirmations, copy certifications, IPEN)
- Attorneys & Legal Professionals (wills & estates, immigration, family law, court documents)

## Credentials
- Colorado State Commissioned Notary Public
- National Notary Association (NNA) Member, Certified & Trained
- Loan Signing System (LSS) Certified
- Certified Apostille Agent
- Background Checked
- $1 Million E&O Insurance
- Native speaker of both English and Spanish

## Service Areas
Primary: Denver Metro Area â€” Lone Tree, Denver, Aurora, Arvada, Broomfield, Castle Rock, Centennial, Englewood, Golden, Greenwood Village, Highlands Ranch, Lakewood, Littleton, Northglenn, Parker, Thornton, Westminster, Wheat Ridge.
Counties: Denver, Douglas, Arapahoe, Jefferson, Adams, Broomfield.
RON: Available worldwide (valid U.S. government-issued ID required).
